00018 #ifndef _CRGUNIT_H

00029 using namespace std;

00038 class CrgUnit {
00039 public:
00040 
00041     CrgUnit() :
00042         _id(-1), _type(NULL), _molid(-1)  {};
00043 
00044     virtual ~CrgUnit();
00045 
00046     CrgUnit(vector <vec> positions, vector <vec> norms, vector <vec> planes,
00047             const unsigned int & id, CrgUnitType * type,
00048             const unsigned int & molId);
00049 
00050     CrgUnit(const unsigned int & id, CrgUnitType * type,
00051             const unsigned int & molId);
00052     
00054     void copyCrgUnit(CrgUnit & acrg);
00056     void copyCrgUnit(CrgUnit & acrg, const int & id);
00057     
00059     const unsigned int& getId() const;
00061     void setId(const int& i);
00062 
00064     CrgUnitType* getType() const;
00065 
00066     // get the name of the charge unit
00067     const string &getName() const { return _name; }
00068     // set the name of the charge unit
00069     void setName(const string &name) { _name = name; }
00070 
00071     // get the molecule ID
00072     const unsigned int& getMolId() const;
00074 
00075     int GetN();
00076 
00077     void SetPos(const int& i, const vec& pos);
00078     void SetNorm(const int& i, const vec& pos);
00079     void SetPlane(const int& i, const  vec& pos);
00080 
00081     vec GetPos(const int & i);
00082     vec GetNorm(const int & i);
00083     vec GetPlane(const int & i);
00084     vec GetCom();
00085 
00087     // what of this can we simplify/beautify?
00088     mol_and_orb * rotate_translate_beads();
00089 
00090     // this is the function called from the rate calculator on already initialised molecules
00091     void rot_two_mol(CrgUnit & two, mol_and_orb & mol1, mol_and_orb & mol2);
00092     void shift(const vec & displ);
00093     void rotate(matrix mat);
00095 
00096 private:
00099     unsigned int _id;
00101     string _name;
00103     unsigned int _molid;
00105     vector < vec > _positions;
00107     vector < vec > _norms;
00109     vector < vec > _planes;
00111     CrgUnitType * _type;
00112 
00113     vector <vec> shift_pos(const vec & a);
00114 };
00115 
00116 inline CrgUnit::CrgUnit(const unsigned int & id, CrgUnitType * type,
00117                  const unsigned int & molId)
00118     : _id(id), _type(type), _molid(molId)
00119 {}
00120 
00121 
00122 inline void CrgUnit::copyCrgUnit(CrgUnit & acrg, const int & id) {
00123     copyCrgUnit(acrg);
00124     _id = id;
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 inline const unsigned int& CrgUnit::getId() const {
00129     return _id;
00130 }
00131 
00132 inline void CrgUnit::setId(const int& i) {
00133     _id = i;
00134 }
00135 
00136 inline CrgUnitType* CrgUnit::getType() const {
00137     return _type;
00138 }
00139 
00140 inline const unsigned int& CrgUnit::getMolId() const {
00141     return _molid;
00142 }
00143 
00144 inline int CrgUnit::GetN() {
00145     if (_norms.size() != _planes.size() || _norms.size() != _positions.size()) {
00146         cerr << "ERror in the crg unit of id:" << _id << endl;
00147     }
00148     return _norms.size();
00149 }
00150 
00151 //inline void CrgUnit::SetCom(vec& com) {
00152 //    _com = com;
00153 //};
00154 
00155 inline void CrgUnit::SetPos(const int& i, const vec& pos) {
00156     if ( i >= _positions.size()){
00157         _positions.resize(i+1);
00158         _norms.resize(i+1);
00159         _planes.resize(i+1);
00160     }
00161     _positions[i] = unit<nm,bohr>::to(pos);
00162 };
00163 inline void CrgUnit::SetNorm(const int& i, const vec& pos) {
00164     if ( i >= _norms.size()){
00165         _positions.resize(i+1);
00166         _norms.resize(i+1);
00167         _planes.resize(i+1);
00168     }
00169     _norms[i] = pos;
00170 };
00171 inline void CrgUnit::SetPlane(const int& i, const vec& pos) {
00172     if ( i >= _planes.size()){
00173         _positions.resize(i+1);
00174         _norms.resize(i+1);
00175         _planes.resize(i+1);
00176     }
00177     _planes[i] = pos;
00178 };
00179 
00180 inline vec CrgUnit::GetPos(const int & i) {
00181     return unit<bohr,nm>::to(_positions[i]);
00182 }
00183 
00184 inline vec CrgUnit::GetNorm(const int & i) {
00185     return _norms[i];
00186 }
00187 
00188 inline vec CrgUnit::GetPlane(const int & i) {
00189     return _planes[i];
00190 }
00191 
00192 inline  vec  CrgUnit::GetCom()  {
00193     vector <vec>::iterator itp = _positions.begin();
00194     vec com(0.,0.,0.);
00195     for (; itp!=_positions.end() ; ++itp )
00196         com += *itp;
00197     return unit<bohr,nm>::to(com/double(_positions.size()));
00198 }
00199 
00200 inline void CrgUnit::shift(const vec & displ) {
00201     vec displ_bohr = unit<nm,bohr>::to(displ);
00202     vector <vec> ::iterator it_vec;
00203     for (it_vec = _positions.begin(); it_vec != _positions.end(); ++it_vec) *it_vec = *it_vec + displ_bohr;
00204 }
00205 
00206 inline vector <vec> CrgUnit::shift_pos(const vec & a) {
00207     vector <vec>::iterator it_pos;
00208     vector <vec> res;
00209     for (it_pos = _positions.begin(); it_pos != _positions.end(); ++it_pos) {
00210         vec b = (*it_pos) + a;
00211         res.push_back(b);
00212     }
00213     return res;
00214 }
00215 
00216 }}
